name: Alexandru Paler
content: Alexandru Paler - Aalto University's research portal Alexandru Paler Professor (Associate Professor), Department of Computer ScienceProfessor (Associate Professor), Computer Science - Quantum Operating Systems (QUANTUM) - Research area https://orcid.org/0000-0002-1536-8858 Phone+358 50 4758064 20202025 Research activity per year Personal profile Artistic and research interestsResearching the design and implementation of quantum software for compiling and optimising quantum circuits, for actively applying quantum error correction methods, and for quantum circuit simulation.
